description: This table contains implant information that changes over time.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the implant record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: SENSOR_MONITORED_HEART_RATE
columns.description: Sensor monitored heart rate.

columns.name: PA_SYSTOLIC_PRESSURE
columns.description: Pulmonary Artery Systolic Pressure

columns.name: PA_SYSTOLIC_PRESSURE_TREND
columns.description: Pulmonary Artery Systolic Pressure Trend

columns.name: PA_DIASTOLIC_PRESSURE
columns.description: Pulmonary Artery Diastolic Pressure

columns.name: PA_DIASTOLIC_PRESSURE_TREND
columns.description: Pulmonary Artery Diastolic Pressure Trend

columns.name: PA_MEAN_PRESSURE
columns.description: Pulmonary Artery Mean Pressure

columns.name: PA_MEAN_PRESSURE_TREND
columns.description: Pulmonary Artery Mean Pressure Trend

columns.name: PATH_OF_CONGESTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the category value for the pathophysiology of congestion


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: ATRIAL_PACED_PERCENTAGE
columns.description: This item stores the Atrial Paced Percentage for an ICD check workflow

columns.name: ATRIAL_SENSE
columns.description: This item stores the Atrial Sense for an ICD check workflow

columns.name: ICD_RSN_GENRTR_UPGRADE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for the reason for the ICD generator upgrade. Choices include  ICD to CRT-D and Single ICD to dual ICD.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Single ICD to dual ICD


ICD to CRT-D

columns.name: ICD_EXPLANT_TREAT_REC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for the planned treatment post explant of the ICD/CRT-D device at the time of the procedure. Choices include downgrade and no reimplant.      


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


No reimplant


Downgrade

columns.name: ICD_CS_LV_SUCCESS_V22_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID indicating whether a coronary sinus/left ventricular (CS/LV) lead was successfully implanted during an ICD implant or ICD change procedure. Other choices include not attempted, attempted but not successful, and previously implanted. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Implant unsuccessful


Not attempted


Successfully implanted


Previously implanted

columns.name: PSA_SLEW
columns.description: The slew rate of the pacing system analyzer.

columns.name: PSA_PACING_IMP
columns.description: The impedance of the pacing system analyzer.

columns.name: MEASUREMENT_ABOVE_THRESHOLD_YN
columns.description:
A measurement was higher than the instruments could record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PSA_PULSE_WIDTH
columns.description: The pulse width of the pacing system analyzer.

columns.name: PREV_PROC_DATE
columns.description: The date when a previous procedure was performed on the implant/joint.

columns.name: HUMERUS_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The humerus implant status category ID for the implant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: GLENOID_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The glenoid implant status category ID for the implant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: LEAD_REMOVAL_ATTEMPT_YN
columns.description:
This item stores whether there was an attempt to remove the lead after disconnecting.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEASUREMENT_ABOVE_THRESHOLD_YN

columns.name: LEAD_REMOVAL_YN
columns.description:
Stores whether the pacemaker lead was removed completely or incompletely


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEASUREMENT_ABOVE_THRESHOLD_YN

columns.name: PSA_THRESHOLD_UNABLE_YN
columns.description:
This item stores whether the PSA capture threshold was unable to be obtained


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEASUREMENT_ABOVE_THRESHOLD_YN

columns.name: PSA_GREATER_THAN_YN
columns.description:
This item stores whether the measurement was higher than the instruments could record.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEASUREMENT_ABOVE_THRESHOLD_YN

columns.name: PSA_AMP_PACED_YN
columns.description:
This item stores whether the lead PSA amplitude was retrieved as a paced measurement.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEASUREMENT_ABOVE_THRESHOLD_YN

columns.name: PSA_AMP_NA_YN
columns.description:
This item stores whether the lead PSA amplitude is not obtained because the patient is pacemaker dependent.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEASUREMENT_ABOVE_THRESHOLD_YN

columns.name: LEAD_SLEW_GREATER_YN
columns.description:
Stores whether the pacemaker lead Pacing System Analyzer slew rate is greater than the maximum amount.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEASUREMENT_ABOVE_THRESHOLD_YN

columns.name: LEAD_REMOVAL_CMT
columns.description: A comment associated with the extent of removal of a lead to store extra information about the removal.

columns.name: PACE_VF_DET_RATE_BPM
columns.description: The VF Detection Rate for Pacemaker Implants in beats per minute (BPM).

columns.name: PACE_FAST_VF_DET_RATE_BPM
columns.description: The Fast VF Detection Rate for Pacemaker Implants in beats per minute (BPM).

columns.name: PACE_VT_DET_RATE_BPM
columns.description: The VT Detection Rate for Pacemaker Implants in beats per minute (BPM).

columns.name: IMP_NUM_ATP_VFZONE
columns.description: The number of VF Zone Therapy ATP for an Implant.

columns.name: IMP_NUM_ATP_FAST_VFZONE
columns.description: The number of Fast VF Zone Therapy ATP for an ICD.

columns.name: IMP_NUM_ATP_VFZONE_ICD
columns.description: The number of VF Zone Therapy ATP for an ICD.

columns.name: IMP_NUM_ATP_FAST_VT_ICD
columns.description: The number of Fast VT Therapy ATP for an ICD.

columns.name: IMP_NUM_ATP_VT_ICD
columns.description: The number of VT Therapy ATP for an ICD.

columns.name: IMP_NUM_SHOCK_VFZONE_ICD
columns.description: The number of VF Zone Therapy Shocks for an ICD.

columns.name: IMP_NUM_SHOCK_VT_ICD
columns.description: The number of VT Therapy Shocks for an ICD.

columns.name: IMP_NUM_SHOCK_FAST_VT_ICD
columns.description: The number of Fast VT Therapy Shocks for an ICD.

columns.name: ASSOCIATED_PROC_ID
columns.description: Associates an implant record with one of the procedures on the procedure log.

columns.name: ASSOCIATED_PROC_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: LIR_RESPONSE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item tracks the response received from the national implant registry (LIR) after an attempted submission.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Submission failed


Processing submission


Registration successful


Registration recorded


Request declined due to wrong entry


Unauthorized


No access to registration


Chamber of Commerce number and location combination not recognized


No product found with matching UDI


Unexpected Error


Required service cannot be approached

columns.name: LEAD1_INSERTION_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not the first lead was inserted.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEASUREMENT_ABOVE_THRESHOLD_YN

columns.name: LEAD2_INSERTION_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not the second lead was inserted.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEASUREMENT_ABOVE_THRESHOLD_YN

columns.name: LEAD3_INSERTION_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not the third lead was inserted.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEASUREMENT_ABOVE_THRESHOLD_YN

columns.name: LEAD1_LOCALIZATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the location of the first lead localization.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: LEAD2_LOCALIZATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the location of the second lead localization.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: LEAD1_LOCALIZATION_C_NAME

columns.name: LEAD3_LOCALIZATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the location of the third lead localization.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: LEAD1_LOCALIZATION_C_NAME

columns.name: LEAD1_POLARITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the type of polarity for the first lead.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: LEAD2_POLARITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the type of polarity for the second lead.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: LEAD1_POLARITY_C_NAME

columns.name: LEAD3_POLARITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the type of polarity for the third lead.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: LEAD1_POLARITY_C_NAME

columns.name: LEAD1_SCREWED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not the first lead was screwed to the heart or some other area.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEASUREMENT_ABOVE_THRESHOLD_YN

columns.name: LEAD2_SCREWED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not the second lead was screwed to the heart or some other area.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEASUREMENT_ABOVE_THRESHOLD_YN

columns.name: LEAD3_SCREWED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not the third lead was screwed to the heart or some other area.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEASUREMENT_ABOVE_THRESHOLD_YN

columns.name: LEAD1_STIMULATION_THRESHOLD
columns.description: Indicates the first lead's stimulation threshold in volts.

columns.name: LEAD2_STIMULATION_THRESHOLD
columns.description: Indicates the second lead's stimulation threshold in volts.

columns.name: LEAD3_STIMULATION_THRESHOLD
columns.description: Indicates the third lead's stimulation threshold in volts.

columns.name: LEAD1_STIMULATION_DURATION
columns.description: Indicates the first lead's stimulation duration in milliseconds.

columns.name: LEAD2_STIMULATION_DURATION
columns.description: Indicates the second lead's stimulation duration in milliseconds.

columns.name: LEAD3_STIMULATION_DURATION
columns.description: Indicates the third lead's stimulation duration in milliseconds.

columns.name: LEAD2_DETECTION_THRESHOLD
columns.description: Indicates the second lead's detection threshold in millivolts.

columns.name: LEAD3_DETECTION_THRESHOLD
columns.description: Indicates the third lead's detection threshold in millivolts.

columns.name: LEAD1_PULSE_AMPLITUDE
columns.description: Indicates the first lead's pulse amplitude in volts.

columns.name: LEAD2_PULSE_AMPLITUDE
columns.description: Indicates the second lead's pulse amplitude in volts.

columns.name: LEAD3_PULSE_AMPLITUDE
columns.description: Indicates the third lead's pulse amplitude in volts.

columns.name: LEAD1_IMPULSION_DURATION_MS
columns.description: Indicates the first lead's impulsion duration in milliseconds.

columns.name: LEAD2_IMPULSION_DURATION_MS
columns.description: Indicates the second lead's impulsion duration in milliseconds.

columns.name: LEAD3_IMPULSION_DURATION_MS
columns.description: Indicates the third lead's impulsion duration in milliseconds.

columns.name: LEAD1_SENSIBILITY_MV
columns.description: Indicates the first lead's sensibility in millivolts.

columns.name: LEAD2_SENSIBILITY_MV
columns.description: Indicates the second lead's sensibility in millivolts.

columns.name: LEAD3_SENSIBILITY_MV
columns.description: Indicate the third lead's sensibility in millivolts.

columns.name: REASON_FOR_EXTRACT
columns.description: Indicates the reason for extract.

columns.name: PACEMAKER_IMP_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the type of pacemaker. To document if this is a temporary pacemaker, use item IMP 56210 - TEMPORARY PACEMAKER? instead.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: DEFIBRILLATOR_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the type of defibrillator.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: IMPEDANCE_OF_FIBRILLATION
columns.description: Indicates the fibrillation impedance in ohms.

columns.name: THERAPY_ZONE_VENT_FIB_AC_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the therapy zone for ventricular fibrillation was activated.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEASUREMENT_ABOVE_THRESHOLD_YN

columns.name: THERAPY_ZONE_VENT_TACHY1_MS
columns.description: Indicates the therapy zone for the first ventricular tachycardia in milliseconds.

columns.name: THERAPY_ZONE_VENT_TACHY1_AC_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the therapy zone for the first ventricular tachycardia was activated.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEASUREMENT_ABOVE_THRESHOLD_YN

columns.name: THERAPY_ZONE_VENT_TACHY2_MS
columns.description: Indicates the therapy zone for the second ventricular tachycardia in milliseconds.

columns.name: THERAPY_ZONE_VENT_TACHY2_AC_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the therapy zone for the second ventricular tachycardia was activated.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEASUREMENT_ABOVE_THRESHOLD_YN

columns.name: THERAPY_ZONE_COMMENT
columns.description: Comments on the therapy zone.

columns.name: PRESTATION1_C_NAME
columns.description:
Type of device 1.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: PRESTATION2_C_NAME
columns.description:
Type of device 2.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: IMP_BATTERY_STATUS
columns.description: This column stores the description of the implant's current battery status.

columns.name: IMP_REPLACEMENT_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the recommended replacement date of the implant.

columns.name: SYMPTOM_EPISODES_COUNT
columns.description: This column stores the number of symptom episodes recorded by the implant.

columns.name: TACHY_EPISODES_COUNT
columns.description: This column stores the number of tachyarrhythmia episodes recorded by the implant.

columns.name: PAUSE_EPISODES_COUNT
columns.description: This column stores the number of pause episodes recorded by the implant.

columns.name: BRADY_EPISODES_COUNT
columns.description: This column stores the number of brady episodes recorded by the implant.

columns.name: ATRIAL_TACHY_EPISODES_COUNT
columns.description: This column stores the number of number of atrial tachyarrhythmias recorded by the implant.

columns.name: AFIB_EPISODES_COUNT
columns.description: This column stores the number of number of atrial fibrillations recorded by the implant.

columns.name: PERCENTAGE_TIME_AFIB
columns.description: This column stores the number of percentage of time in atrial fibrillation recorded by the implant.

columns.name: PACE_ICD_AV_DELAY_COMMENT
columns.description: Comment to describe the AV delay of the pacemaker.

columns.name: PACEMAKER_POCKET_LOC_CMT
columns.description: Comment to describe the pocket location of the pacemaker.

columns.name: DFT_CHARGE_TIME_SEC
columns.description: Indicates the charge time of the DFT energy in seconds.

columns.name: DFT_PERFORMED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a DFT was performed.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEASUREMENT_ABOVE_THRESHOLD_YN

columns.name: DFT_HIGH_VOLTAGE_IMPEDANCE_OHM
columns.description: Indicates the DFT high voltage impedance in Ohms.

columns.name: DFT_SUCCESSFUL_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the DFT was successful.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEASUREMENT_ABOVE_THRESHOLD_YN

columns.name: LEAD_REMOVAL_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the method in which the lead was removed.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Removed with Laser


Removed with Traction
